reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Promoting Social and Environmental Development in Kurdistan Region

description.narrative: Project ended in 2015, old description: Purpose of the project is to strengthen the capacity of the NGOs to identify and meet their needs and the needs of the community by using their own resources and abilities. Fida partners with local NGOs targeting wom en, children and people with disabilities. These local NGOs are mainly located in areas under poverty pockets of Jordan. Those communities lack knowledge, education, and resources. The NGOs implement hand on hands capacity building programs to reach a sust ainable development for their communities according to their goals and needs. Through the program, partners are open to change and empowered to implement trainings and activities to raise the communities' social wellbeing (gender equality, psychological, p hysical and social health etc.), family income (vocational training, business training etc.) and a strong sustainable organisational structure for the NGOs (project management trainings etc.). One member NGO started conducting an English course for the chi ldren of their community, and another NGO is opening new branch for the Kindgarten. This NGO is following the Management Manual, that they set together, and now they are setting their safety plan for the Kindgarten. After these communities attended Fida tr ainings, a lot of appreciation was expressed - like they are having better self-esteem, better communication skills, and they are more aware about their families' and children's needs. Fida's aim is to reach an improved holistic social wellbeing in the Jor danian communities.
